name: Modern Office Chair
description: A sleek and modern office chair with ergonomic support and adjustable height for comfort during long working hours.

name: Leather Executive Chair
description: This luxurious leather executive chair offers premium comfort and style with a high backrest and padded armrests.

name: Minimalist Dining Chair
description: A stylish, minimalist dining chair with a wooden frame and cushioned seat, perfect for a contemporary dining setup.

name: Classic Rocking Chair
description: A traditional wooden rocking chair with a curved base, ideal for relaxing and adding a vintage touch to your living room.

name: Outdoor Patio Chair
description: Durable and weather-resistant, this outdoor patio chair is perfect for enjoying the outdoors with a comfortable mesh seat.

name: Scandinavian Lounge Chair
description: A beautiful Scandinavian-inspired lounge chair with a wide seat, wooden legs, and soft upholstery for ultimate relaxation.
